resources.string:
Biography of mine. 

Hi! My name is Bonacci Bigollo. 
I am beginner Android-developer. I was started learning development more than 3 years ago, 
but always something happened and stops me continue studying. But now i am ready to start it 
again and will become the most wanted Android-developer in my region!!! 

P.S 
This name is fake, don't like to share it with wide world ;)
